source.buildspec:
version: 0.2

phases:
  pre_build:
    commands:
      - echo Logging in to Amazon ECR...
      - aws ecr get-login-password --region $AWS_DEFAULT_REGION | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com
  build:
    commands:
      - echo Build started on `date`
      - echo Building the Docker image for server...
      - cd application/twenty-server
      - docker build -t $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-server:latest .
      - cd ../..
      - echo Building the Docker image for worker...
      - cd application/twenty-worker
      - docker build -t $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-worker:latest .
      - cd ../..
  post_build:
    commands:
      - echo Build completed on `date`
      - echo Pushing the Docker images to ECR...
      - docker push $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-server:latest
      - docker push $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-worker:latest
      - echo Writing image definitions file...
      - printf '[{"name":"twenty-server","imageUri":"%s"},{"name":"twenty-worker","imageUri":"%s"}]' $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-server:latest $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-worker:latest > imagedefinitions.json
artifacts:
  files:
    - "imagedefinitions.json"

version: 0.2

phases:
  pre_build:
    commands:
      - echo Logging in to Amazon ECR...
      - aws ecr get-login-password --region $AWS_DEFAULT_REGION | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com
  build:
    commands:
      - echo Build started on `date`
      - echo Building the Docker image for server...
      - cd application/twenty-server
      - docker build -t $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-server:latest .
      - cd ../..
      - echo Building the Docker image for worker...
      - cd application/twenty-worker
      - docker build -t $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-worker:latest .
      - cd ../..
  post_build:
    commands:
      - echo Build completed on `date`
      - echo Pushing the Docker images to ECR...
      - docker push $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-server:latest
      - docker push $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-worker:latest
      - echo Writing image definitions file...
      - printf '[{"name":"twenty-server","imageUri":"%s"},{"name":"twenty-worker","imageUri":"%s"}]' $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-server:latest $AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com/twenty-worker:latest > imagedefinitions.json
artifacts:
  files:
    - "imagedefinitions.json"

db_instance_arn.description: ARN of the RDS instance to backup

connection_arn.description: ARN of the CodeStar Connection to GitHub

alb_alarm_name.description: CloudWatch alarm name for ALB 5XX errors

ecs_cpu_alarm_name.description: CloudWatch alarm name for ECS CPU usage

ecs_memory_alarm_name.description: CloudWatch alarm name for ECS memory usage

rds_cpu_alarm_name.description: CloudWatch alarm name for RDS CPU usage

anomaly_rule_arn.description: ARN of the EventBridge rule for cost anomalies

cur_bucket.description: Name of the CUR S3 bucket

alert_email.description: Email for budget and anomaly notifications

anomaly_threshold_amount.description: Absolute JPY threshold for anomaly alerts

budget_threshold_amount.description: Alert threshold as percentage of JPY budget

cur_s3_bucket.description: S3 bucket to receive CUR files (must exist)

region.description: AWS region for CUR bucket & budgets

main_id.description: The ID of the primary RDS instance

db_sg_ids.description: List of security group IDs for the DB

prefix.description: Name prefix for all DB resources

lambda_s3_bucket.description: S3 bucket holding the Lambda zip

lambda_s3_key.description: S3 object key for the Lambda zip

primary_db_id.description: The ID of the primary RDS instance to watch for failover

replica_arn.description: The ARN of the read-replica for IAM policy

replica_id.description: The ID of the read-replica to promote

alb_5xx_alarm_name.description: Name of the ALB 5XX CloudWatch alarm

ecs_cpu_alarm_name.description: Name of the ECS high-CPU alarm

ecs_memory_alarm_name.description: Name of the ECS high-memory alarm

flow_logs_log_group_arn.description: The ARN of the log group used for VPC flow logs

rds_cpu_alarm_name.description: Name of the RDS high-CPU alarm

blue_target_group_arn.description: ARN of the blue target group

blue_target_group_name.description: Name of the blue ECS target group

green_target_group_arn.description: ARN of the green target group

green_target_group_name.description: Name of the green ECS target group

log_group_arn.description: CloudWatch Log Group ARN for VPC Flow Logs

vpc_flow_logs_role_arn.description: IAM role ARN to use for VPC Flow Logs
IAM role ARN for VPC Flow Logs

anomaly_threshold_amount.description: Absolute yen threshold for cost anomaly alerts

budget_threshold_percent.description: Percent of budget at which to alert

cur_s3_bucket.description: Name of the S3 bucket to receive CUR files

db_sg_ids.description: List of security group IDs to attach to the database

lambda_code_key.description: Key of the Lambda ZIP in S3

pipeline_name.description: Name prefix for the CodePipeline and related resources
